modName: Secret Of The Dwemer - Czech translation
summary: Jedna se o cesky preklad modu Secret Of The Dwemer autora SteelChi. Archiv obsahuje pouze .esp soubor. Pro spravnou funkci modu je zapotrebi stahnout si puvodni mod odtud http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5048
descriptionHtml:
[size=200][color=red][b]FOR CZECH PLAYERS ONLY![/b][/color][/size]
[color=cyan][i][u]Czech players have the right to play in czech.[/u][/i][/color]

Autor: [b]SteelChi[/b]
Puvodn√≠ mod stazitelny z: [b]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5048[/b]   nebo   [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5048][b]PRIMY ODKAZ / DIRECT LINK[/b][/url]
